snippet: HUNT--Dr. Earl Busby "Buz." January 8, 1933 - April 12, 2016. Professor Emeritus, University of Washington. Known internationally for research studying human intelligence and developing computer models of human thought, Dr. Hunt received "Lifetime achievement awards" from the International Society of Intelligence Research and the Association for Psychological Science, and the American Psychological Association's William James book award for "Will we be smart enough: a cognitive analysis of the coming workforce." Buz is survived by Mary Lou, his wife of 61 years, and their children and grandchildren. Remembrances can be made to the Earl & Mary Lou Hunt Graduate Fellowship at University of Washington https://www.washington.edu/ giving/make-a-gift/?page= funds&source--typ=3& source=HUNSCH 1/3
